title: How do you find the best Help to Buy Isa rates?
text:
Aspiring homeowners should act now as they have less than two months left in which to make use of a handy government savings scheme.

The deadline for opening a Help to Buy Isa falls on November 30. Even if you don't plan to buy a home imminently, by putting even just £1 into an account now you can make sure you're eligible for thousands of pounds in free government bonuses later on.

Savers can put away up to £200 a month into their Help to Buy Isa. When you come to buying your first home you receive a 25 per cent top-up from the government on any money you’ve put in.

This free money is only available once you’ve put at least £1,600 into your Isa and the maximum bonus you can receive is £3,000....
description: Aspiring homeowners should act now as they have less than two months left in which to make use of a handy government savings scheme.
